Articles.Content:
I'm currently experiencing alot of crashes when flying planes. The error log always says "Write to location xxxxxxxx caused an access violation." the location varys but always is the same as the adress of "RAX" under Context. 

Some of my "crash.dmp"s and "error.log"s: https://mega.nz/#!FxtBGSRY!c4298LUcgGBHXS-aUia9RkJufxV7ijm3_cU2wVpSlqk

Virus Scan for the .zip: https://www.virustotal.com/de/file/442af8355a716ae47370f1d3c6dd5d050e1abef20426c37ecd9229f0d951735c/analysis/1479230776/

My installed Mods(I know its alot): http://pastebin.com/YZttRTXL
